styles={pageContainer:{padding:"1.25rem",position:"relative",minHeight:"100vh",boxSizing:"border-box"},searchContainer:{marginBottom:"1rem",display:"flex",alignItems:"center",maxWidth:"600px"},searchIcon:{fontSize:"1.2rem",marginRight:"0.5rem"},searchInput:{flex:1,padding:"0.5rem",fontSize:"1rem",borderRadius:"4px",border:"1px solid #ccc"},table:{width:"100%",borderCollapse:"collapse",marginTop:0,tableLayout:"fixed"},tableHeaderRow:{background:"#e8f0fe"},tableHeader:{padding:"0.6rem",border:"1px solid 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.12)"},modalForm:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",gap:"0.9rem"},modalLabel:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",fontSize:"0.9rem",color:"#222"},modalInput:{padding:"0.5rem",fontSize:"0.95rem",borderRadius:"6px",border:"1px
